FuncDef:
The metrics enable command enables the data collection function for fault detection and locating on a device.
The undo metrics enable command disables the data collection function for fault detection and locating on a device. The metrics enable command enables the data collection function for fault detection and locating on a device. The undo metrics enable command disables the data collection function for fault detection and locating on a device. By default, the data collection function used for fault detection and locating is enabled on a device.
